chunks.zh: 我这个条件能买 35 左右的车吗？有啥推荐
chunks.en: With my current financial situation, can I afford a car around 350,000 yuan? Any recommendations?

chunks.zh: 本人今年 31 ，无任何贷款，上海，有大牌，存款 40 个，三口之家一年能存 18 个左右。购车长辈能补贴 20%，只考虑油车，有啥推荐的吗？
chunks.en: I'm 31 this year, no loans, in Shanghai, have a license plate, 4 million yuan in savings, a family of three can save about 180,000 yuan a year. Elders can subsidize 20% of the car purchase. Only considering gasoline cars, any recommendations?

chunks.zh: 我开过很多欧洲车（德系、意大利、英系），我感觉如果再换车，我会买个丰田/雷克萨斯，因为确实省事。
chunks.en: I have driven many European cars (German, Italian, British), and I feel that if I were to buy another car, I would buy a Toyota/Lexus because it is really hassle-free.

chunks.zh: 我的欧系车，到了 6 万公里左右，要换的东西一大堆，包括火花塞、机油、刹车油、波箱油、前后差速器油、防冻液等等，而且，这些配件贵死了，我目前的车一套下来，得好几万。
chunks.en: My European cars, after about 60,000 kilometers, need a lot of things replaced, including spark plugs, engine oil, brake fluid, transmission oil, front and rear differential oil, antifreeze, etc. Moreover, these parts are terribly expensive. A full set for my current car costs tens of thousands of yuan.

chunks.zh: 其中光机油一项，就 5000 多元，使用壳牌 10-60 的定制机油。
chunks.en: The engine oil alone costs more than 5,000 yuan, using Shell 10-60 custom oil.

chunks.zh: 火花塞 6 个，也是 5000 多元。
chunks.en: Six spark plugs also cost more than 5,000 yuan.

chunks.zh: 这些还必须换，不换的话就是各种小毛病，漏水漏油等（ bmw 也不外乎如此）。
chunks.en: These things must be replaced. If they are not replaced, there will be various minor problems, such as water leaks and oil leaks (BMW is no exception).

chunks.zh: 所以真的很麻烦。
chunks.en: So it's really troublesome.

chunks.zh: 我再买车就选个丰田凯美瑞的自吸发动机就好，混动都不需要，越是电子配置越高，故障越多，后期越难打理。
chunks.en: If I buy another car, I will choose a Toyota Camry with a naturally aspirated engine. I don't even need a hybrid. The more electronic features there are, the more failures there will be, and the more difficult it will be to maintain later.

chunks.zh: 不说用途，那干 brz 吧 。
chunks.en: Without specifying the intended use, then get a BRZ.

chunks.zh: @miscnote  你这 5000 多的火花塞 金子做的还是银子做的，我 4 个怎么才 100 多块钱
chunks.en: @miscnote Are your spark plugs that cost over 5,000 yuan made of gold or silver? Mine only cost a little over 100 yuan for 4.

chunks.zh: 新 X3 ，空间大适合有小孩家庭。
chunks.en: The new X3 has a large space and is suitable for families with children.

chunks.zh: 北京这条件开理想的很多。
chunks.en: In Beijing, many people with your conditions drive Li Auto cars.

chunks.zh: 31 了，不是遇到什么困难情况的话就别让长辈补贴了吧
chunks.en: You're 31. Unless you're in a difficult situation, don't let your elders subsidize you.

chunks.zh: 进口新皇冠 sedan ，或者 Genesis G80 。买车别随大流，如果你是一个爱钻研的人。
chunks.en: Imported new Crown sedan, or Genesis G80. Don't follow the crowd when buying a car if you are a person who likes to research.

chunks.zh: 建议继续 cc一共就 40 ，买 30w 多的车。。。真是一把梭啊
chunks.en: Suggest keeping the CC. You only have 400,000 yuan in total, and you're buying a car for more than 300,000 yuan... you're really going all in.

chunks.zh: @zangai 是的，混动才是版本答案，而且这个车的大床模式太适合旅行，连 L9 的充气床模式都相形见绌，开到哪睡到哪，舒服又安全，扎在景区里深度玩几天，进城就去趟洗浴中心，根本不用住酒店了。
chunks.en: @zangai Yes, hybrid is the best solution, and the large bed mode of this car is perfect for traveling. Even the inflatable bed mode of the L9 pales in comparison. You can drive and sleep wherever you go, comfortably and safely. You can stay in the scenic area for a few days, and go to a bath center when you go to the city. You don't need to stay in a hotel at all.

chunks.zh: 我不管我就要给你推荐我喜欢的，哈佛 H9 柴油版
chunks.en: I don't care, I'm going to recommend what I like, the Haval H9 diesel version.

chunks.zh: @hallostr 二手合资车都不要买，出行坐地铁不香吗，钱存着死了铺棺材板上面躺着舒服
chunks.en: @hallostr Don't buy any used joint venture cars. Isn't it better to take the subway? Save the money and use it to buy a comfortable coffin when you die.

chunks.zh: 新 X3+1
chunks.en: New X3 +1

chunks.zh: 补充一句，是置换，现在开的是大众 CC ，16 年买的
chunks.en: Adding one more point, it's a trade-in. I'm currently driving a Volkswagen CC, bought in 2016.

chunks.zh: 新 X3 或者 RX350h / RX300 ，更推荐前者，不过最好至少等一两个月买，按照宝马的尿性过一两个月就会降价
chunks.en: New X3 or RX350h / RX300, I recommend the former more, but it's best to wait at least a month or two to buy it. According to BMW's habit, the price will drop in a month or two.

chunks.zh: 星越 L😄
chunks.en: Xingyue L 😄

chunks.zh: 买个 20 多的理想 L6 也不错
chunks.en: Buying a Li Auto L6 for a little over 200,000 yuan is also good.

chunks.zh: 按现在消费行情来说没问题，一大堆低首付超长分期的电车在路上
chunks.en: According to the current consumer market, it's no problem. There are a lot of electric cars with low down payments and ultra-long installments on the road.

chunks.zh: X1 M35Li
chunks.en: X1 M35Li

chunks.zh: 等年末上新款 X3 ，现在价格虚高
chunks.en: Wait for the new X3 to be released at the end of the year. The current price is inflated.

chunks.zh: 理想 L7
chunks.en: Li Auto L7
